TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed Collation extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定打印机在打印多页打印作业的多个副本时是否逐份打印输出。

span.span: Specifies whether a printer collates output when it prints multiple copies of a multi-page print job.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，标准打印机通过打印第一个副本的每一页，然后打印第二个副本的每一页等来排输出。A standard printer typically collates output by printing every page of the first copy, then every page of the second copy, and so on. 如果标准打印机未进行逐份打印，它将打印第一页的每个副本，然后打印第二页的每个副本，依次类推。When a standard printer does not collate, it prints every copy of the first page, then every copy of the second page, and so on. 某些打印机专门配备了整理箱。这些特殊设置的打印机的打印顺序可能不同于标准打印机的打印顺序;但结果相同：多页面打印作业的每个副本都按正确的顺序包含其所有页面，而无需手动排序。Some printers are specially equipped with collating bins. The printing sequence for these specially equipped printers may differ from those of standard printers; however the outcome is the same: each copy of a multi-paged print job contains all its pages in the proper sequence without manual sorting. 使用此类型的值主要用于以下目的。Use the values of this type primarily for the following purposes. - 作为的 属性的集合的成员， 这些值指示打印机支持的输出类型。As members of the collection, which is a property of , these values indicate the type of output that the printer supports. (许多打印机都支持这两种类型。 ) (Many printers support both types.) - 作为的属性的值 ，该值指示打印机是否要逐份打印。As the value of the property of a , the value instructs the printer whether to collate. 对象的属性中从不使用 **未知** 值 。The **Unknown** value is never used in properties of objects. 永远不应将 属性设置为 " **未知**"。You should never set a property to **Unknown**. 如果某些其他 产生的应用程序创建了将排序规则功能设置为无法识别的排序规则选项的 *PrintTicket 文档* ，则 使用该文档构造的应用程序中的对象将作为该属性的值 **未知** 。If some other producing application has created a *PrintTicket document* that sets the collation feature to an unrecognized collation option, then a object in your application that is constructed with that document will have **Unknown** as the value of the property. 尽管 和 类不能被继承，但你可以扩展 [打印架构](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) 来识别在或类中不考虑的打印设备功能 。Although the and classes cannot be inherited, you can extend the [Print Schema](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186397) to recognize print device features that are not accounted for in the or classes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：扩展打印架构和创建新的打印系统类](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aa970573(v=vs.100))。For more information see [How to: Extend the Print Schema and Create New Print System Classes](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aa970573(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何测试打印机的功能并配置打印作业以利用这些功能。The following example shows how to test a printer's capabilities and configure a print job to take advantage of them. 。. [!code-cpp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CPP/XpsCreate.cpp#printercapabilities)] [!code-csharp[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/CSharp/XpsCreate.cs#printercapabilities)] [!code-vb[XpsCreate#PrinterCapabilities](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/XpsCreate/visualbasic/xpscreate.vb#printercapabilities)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Collation Collated = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Collation Uncollated = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.Collation Unknown = int32(0)

summary.span: 该功能（其选项由此枚举表示）设置为未在 打印架构中定义的选项。

span.span: The feature (whose options are represented by this enumeration) is set to an option not defined in the Print Schema.
